typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Mois_Selection as string,
		Code_depot as string,
		NoOffre as string,
		NoArtVGF as string,
		Agence as string,
		Qte_Validee_VGF as string,
		NoCli as string,
		PA_Valide_VGF as string,
		Mois as string,
		{Année} as string,
		CompanyId as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		ca_avoir as string,
		yearmonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Avoir
source(output(
		{ Org commerciale} as string,
		{Canal distribution} as integer,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		{Document de vente} as string,
		Poste as string,
		{Jour calendaire} as string,
		{1ereDateLivrDdee} as string,
		{Agence commerciale corrigé} as string,
		{ATC Corrigé} as string,
		{Donneur d'ordre} as string,
		{Recept de march} as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		{Type doc vente} as string,
		{Type de poste} as string,
		Livraison as string,
		{Type de livraison} as string,
		{Type poste Livraison} as string,
		Facture as string,
		{Type de facture} as string,
		{Type poste Facture} as string,
		{Mois calendrier} as string,
		{Année civile} as string,
		{Motif commande} as string,
		{Qté cdée} as string,
		{CA cdé} as string,
		{Qté livrée} as string,
		{CA livré} as string,
		{Qté facturée} as string,
		{CA facturé} as string,
		{Cout standard cdé} as string,
		{Cout fabrication} as string,
		{Cout standard livré} as string,
		{Cout standard facturé} as string,
		date_id as string,
		year as string,
		yearmonth as string,
		qt_cd_e as string,
		ca_cd_ as string,
		qt_livr_e as string,
		ca_livr_ as string,
		qt_factur_e as string,
		ca_factur_ as string,
		year_month as string,
		reference as string,
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Facturation
source(output(
		{Agence commerciale} as string,
		{ATC Client} as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		{Niveau 1} as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		{Niveau 2} as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		{Niveau 3} as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Client as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Rue as string,
		{Dép} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		{Localité} as string,
		{Téléphone 1} as string,
		{Numéro de télécopie} as string,
		{Attribut 2} as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Email as string,
		SIRET as string,
		{Niveau 4} as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		{Groupe de clients} as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		{Groupe de clients 5} as string,
		Column_27 as string,
		{Attribut 1} as string,
		Column_29 as string,
		{Attribut 3} as string,
		Column_31 as string,
		{Récept. de march.} as string,
		Column_33 as string,
		{Destinataire facture} as string,
		Column_35 as string,
		Payeur as string,
		Column_37 as string,
		{Témoin suppr. Tous domaines} as string,
		{Org. commerciale} as string,
		Column_40 as string,
		{Canal distribution} as string,
		Column_42 as string,
		{Secteur d'activité} as string,
		Column_44 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ExtarctionSAP
source(output(
		Marque as string,
		{Code Postal début} as string,
		{Code Postal fin} as string,
		Utilisateur as string,
		Fonction as string,
		{Département} as string,
		ATC as string,
		NomATC as string,
		{Plan primes} as string,
		Matricule as string,
		{Canal final} as string,
		toreplicate as string,
		dd as string,
		DR as string,
		{Code postal} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> REFATC
source(output(
		DateOffre as string,
		{Date Prev Cde} as string,
		{Code projet} as string,
		Projet as string,
		Type as string,
		{CP projet} as string,
		{Ville projet} as string,
		NbLogement as string,
		{Référence} as string,
		Marque as string,
		Famille as string,
		Produit as string,
		{Quantité} as string,
		{Prix de base} as string,
		{Prix DO} as string,
		{Prix pro} as string,
		{Prix total} as string,
		{Numéro interne 1} as string,
		Client as string,
		{Ville client} as string,
		{Type financement} as string,
		{Numéro interne 2} as string,
		{Négoce} as string,
		{Ville négoce} as string,
		{Statut offre} as string,
		Responsable as string,
		Groupe as string,
		Offre as string,
		{Date de maj statut} as string,
		{Numéro avant vente} as string,
		{Créateur offre} as string,
		{Commentaire interne} as string,
		{Offre dérogée} as string,
		{Contrat cadre} as string,
		{Offre nationale} as string,
		{Année Tarif} as string,
		PotentielP1N as string,
		PotentielP2N as string,
		PotentielP3N as string,
		PotentielP4N as string,
		PotentielP5N as string,
		PotentielP6N as string,
		{DateFinValidité} as string,
		CODE_CMI as string,
		NOM_CMI as string,
		CodeATC as string,
		DEEE as string,
		OffreSupprimee as string,
		{Date de création} as string,
		NomSignataire1 as string,
		NomSignataire2 as string,
		DateSignataire1 as string,
		DateSignataire2 as string,
		{DateDérogation} as string,
		Canal as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Offre
source(output(
		OrgCm as string,
		CDis as string,
		Article as string,
		Description as string,
		{Hiérarch.groupe} as string,
		{Hiérarch.locale} as string,
		Predecessor as string,
		Successor as string,
		St as string,
		{Désignation Statut} as string,
		{Déb. val.} as string,
		{N1.groupe} as string,
		{N2.groupe} as string,
		{N3.groupe} as string,
		{N4.groupe} as string,
		{N5.groupe} as string,
		{N6.groupe} as string,
		{N7.groupe} as string,
		{N1.locale} as string,
		{N2.locale} as string,
		{N3.locale} as string,
		{N4.locale} as string,
		{N5.locale} as string,
		{N6.locale} as string,
		{N7.locale} as string,
		{N1.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N2.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N3.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N4.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N5.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N6.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N7.groupe.designation} as string,
		{N1.locale.designation} as string,
		{N2.locale.designation} as string,
		{N3.locale.designation} as string,
		{N4.locale.designation} as string,
		{N5.locale.designation} as string,
		{N6.locale.designation} as string,
		{N7.locale.designation} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> articleInput
source(output(
		{Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Nom du compte} as string,
		{Compte principal: Numéro du compte} as string,
		{Code postal} as string,
		Ville as string,
		{Groupe cible/Typologie générale} as string,
		{Sous groupe cible/Typologie détaillée} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> inputEPS
source(output(
		Article as string,
		Distributeur as string,
		prix_unitaire as string,
		{Durée_période} as string,
		{Période} as string,
		{Mois début} as string,
		{Mois fin} as string,
		mois1 as string,
		annee1 as string,
		mois2 as string,
		annee2 as string,
		dd as string,
		month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> PrixPeriode
source(output(
		WholeSalerID as string,
		WholeSalerHubID as string,
		HubName as string,
		HubSAPid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> plateforme
typeCast compose(mapColumn(
		mois_selection = Mois_Selection,
		no_offre = NoOffre,
		reference,
		agence = Agence,
		qte_valide = Qte_Validee_VGF,
		no_cli = NoCli,
		pa_valide_vgf = PA_Valide_VGF,
		month = Mois,
		year = {Année},
		companyid = CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		HubSapID = HubSAPid
	),
	composition: 'createIdAvoir') ~> createIndexcolAvoir@(output1)
inputForFonction compose(mapColumn(
		temp_id = tempid,
		qte_facturer = {Qté facturée},
		year,
		hubsapid = HubSAPid,
		reference,
		{CA facturé}
	),
	composition: 'createIndexFacturation') ~> createIndexYearFacturation@(output1)
Avoir select(mapColumn(
		Mois_Selection,
		Code_depot,
		NoOffre,
		reference = NoArtVGF,
		Agence,
		Qte_Validee_VGF,
		NoCli,
		PA_Valide_VGF,
		Mois,
		{Année},
		CompanyId,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> selectAvoir
filtreCompanyAndQte derive(Mois = toInteger(Mois),
		{Année} = toInteger({Année}),
		HubSAPid = "16012633") ~> typeCast
Facturation derive(month = right(yearmonth, 2),
		tOrigin = "facturation",
		{CA facturé} = toFloat({CA facturé})/ toInteger({Qté facturée})) ~> month
Select1 aggregate(groupBy({Canal final},
		Marque,
		code_postal_atc),
	Matricule = max(Matricule),
		NomATC = max(NomATC),
		ATC = max(ATC)) ~> Agregat
Agregat select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Canal final},
		code_postal_atc,
		Matricule,
		NomATC,
		ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectcolonneATC
Offre select(mapColumn(
		DateOffre,
		{Référence},
		Marque,
		{Quantité},
		Client,
		Responsable,
		Offre,
		ATC = CodeATC,
		Canal,
		Produit,
		{Créateur offre}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColonneOffre
SelectColonneOffre aggregate(groupBy(Offre,
		Canal,
		ATC),
	DateOffre = first(DateOffre)) ~> AgregatOffreCanalATC
AgregatOffreCanalATC select(mapColumn(
		Offre,
		canal = Canal,
		{ATC performance} = ATC
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectOffre
ExtarctionSAP select(mapColumn(
		{Agence commerciale},
		Client,
		{Code postal},
		{Téléphone 1},
		{Numéro de télécopie},
		{Org. commerciale}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectSAP
selectAvoir filter(CompanyId=="11" && toDouble(Qte_Validee_VGF)>0) ~> filtreCompanyAndQte
REFATC select(mapColumn(
		Marque,
		{Code Postal début},
		{Code Postal fin},
		Utilisateur,
		Fonction,
		{Département},
		ATC,
		NomATC,
		{Plan primes},
		Matricule,
		{Canal final},
		toreplicate,
		dd,
		code_postal_atc = {Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
articleInput select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = OrgCm,
		article = Article
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endArticle
inputEPS select(mapColumn(
		client = {Numéro du compte},
		{Code postal}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endEPS
PrixPeriode derive({Période} = iif(length({Période})>1,{Période},"0"+{Période})) ~> derivedColumn100
derivedColumn100 select(mapColumn(
		Article,
		Distributeur,
		{Période},
		annee2,
		month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> columnChoicePrix
plateforme filter(HubSAPid=="16012633") ~> filter1
month keyGenerate(output(tempid as long),
	startAt: 1L,
	stepValue: 1L) ~> surrogateKey1
surrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		{Qté facturée},
		{CA facturé},
		year,
		reference,
		HubSAPid,
		tempid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> inputForFonction
surrogateKey1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id = { Org commerciale},
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		year,
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		month,
		tOrigin,
		tempid
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> methadata
createIndexYearFacturation@output1 select(mapColumn(
		temp_id,
		{CA facturé},
		indexcols2,
		{Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endIndex
methadata, endIndex join(tempid == temp_id,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join1
join1 select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		year,
		yearmonth,
		reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid,
		month,
		tOrigin,
		tempid,
		{CA facturé},
		indexcols2,
		{Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endxFacturation
derivedColumn101 select(mapColumn(
		mois_selection,
		no_offre,
		reference,
		agence,
		qte_valide,
		no_cli,
		pa_valide_vgf,
		month,
		year,
		companyid,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth,
		HubSapID,
		dd,
		indexcols2,
		qte_avoir,
		canal,
		tOrigin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> endAvoir
createIndexcolAvoir@output1 derive(tOrigin = "avoir",
		canal = iif(substring(no_offre,1,2)=="FP", "FP",     iif(substring(no_offre,1,2)=="FS", "FS", "FC"))) ~> derivedColumn101
endAvoir, endxFacturation join(endAvoir@indexcols2 == endxFacturation@indexcols2,
	joinType:'outer',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> join2
inner select(mapColumn(
		no_offre,
		{Recept de march} = agence,
		no_cli,
		yearmonth = endAvoir@yearmonth,
		qte_avoir,
		canal,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		year = endxFacturation@year,
		yearmonth = endxFacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = endxFacturation@reference,
		HubSAPid = endxFacturation@HubSAPid,
		month = endxFacturation@month,
		{CA facturé} = ca_avoir,
		{Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> innerSelect
join2 filter(isNull(endxFacturation@tOrigin)) ~> avoirResidus
join2 filter(!isNull(endAvoir@tOrigin) && !isNull(endxFacturation@tOrigin)) ~> inner
join2 filter(isNull(endAvoir@tOrigin)) ~> facturationleft
avoirResidus select(mapColumn(
		mois_selection,
		no_offre,
		reference = endAvoir@reference,
		agence,
		qte_valide,
		no_cli,
		pa_valide_vgf,
		month = endAvoir@month,
		year = endAvoir@year,
		companyid,
		ca_avoir,
		yearmonth = endAvoir@yearmonth,
		HubSapID,
		dd,
		indexcols2 = endAvoir@indexcols2,
		qte_avoir,
		canal
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select2
facturationleft select(mapColumn(
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		year = endxFacturation@year,
		yearmonth = endxFacturation@yearmonth,
		reference = endxFacturation@reference,
		WholeSalerID,
		WholeSalerHubID,
		HubName,
		HubSAPid = endxFacturation@HubSAPid,
		month = endxFacturation@month,
		tOrigin = endxFacturation@tOrigin,
		tempid,
		{CA facturé},
		indexcols2 = endxFacturation@indexcols2,
		{Qté facturée}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> select3
derivedColumn102 select(mapColumn(
		no_offre,
		agence = {Recept de march},
		no_cli,
		yearmonth,
		canal,
		marque_id,
		{Canal distribution},
		{Secteur d'activité},
		{Document de vente},
		Poste,
		{Jour calendaire},
		{1ereDateLivrDdee},
		{Agence commerciale corrigé},
		{ATC Corrigé},
		{Donneur d'ordre},
		{Recept de march},
		{Destinataire facture},
		{Type doc vente},
		{Type de poste},
		Livraison,
		{Type de livraison},
		{Type poste Livraison},
		Facture,
		{Type de facture},
		{Type poste Facture},
		{Mois calendrier},
		{Année civile},
		{Motif commande},
		{Qté cdée},
		{CA cdé},
		{Qté livrée},
		{CA livré},
		{Cout standard cdé},
		{Cout fabrication},
		{Cout standard livré},
		{Cout standard facturé},
		year,
		reference,
		HubSAPid,
		month,
		{CA facturé},
		{Qté facturée} = qte_avoir,
		data_origin
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
